* Beautiful - lovely
* Joyful - happy
* Glorious - wonderful
* Lovely - delightful
* Wonderful - fantastic
* Tragic - unfortunate
* Horrible - unpleasant
* Agony - suffering
* Painful - distressing
* Terrible - dreadful
* Awful - unacceptable
* Humiliate - embarrass
* Nasty - unpleasant

I hope this list helps you in a positive and respectful way. Remember, language has the power to shape our attitudes and beliefs, so let's use it to create a more inclusive and compassionate world.
